about.manifesto:
Creemos en el futuro descentralizado que ofrece Bitcoin.

Nuestra misión es introducir Bitcoin a mil millones de personas en un plazo de una década. Nuestras herramientas son la educación y la información.

Apoyamos a las comunidades locales de Bitcoiners proporcionando contenido educativo de código abierto y ofreciendo una red de mentores de Bitcoin.

Nuestra filosofía está inspirada en el manifiesto cypherpunk. Así como ellos defendieron la privacidad, nosotros defendemos la educación. Creemos que el conocimiento es la base de la libertad y el cambio.

Somos solo Bitcoin.

Abogamos por la responsabilidad individual y la independencia que ofrece tener tus propias claves.

Instamos a la verificación, no a la confianza ciega.

Creemos que al arreglar el dinero, arreglamos el mundo.

Somos descentralizados y de código abierto, evitando cualquier punto único de fallo.

Fomentamos la libre difusión de nuestro contenido.

Aspiramos a un mundo que funcione desde la base, donde el individuo esté en el centro.

Simplificamos, educamos, compartimos.

Únete a nosotros en nuestra misión de hacer que el mundo tome la píldora naranja.
about.pageSubtitle: The Sovereign University ofrece educación gratuita sobre Bitcoin para todos.
about.thanks1: Un agradecimiento especial a nuestros primeros seguidores, quienes nos han ayudado a perseverar a lo largo de los años.
about.thanks2: The Sovereign University es un esfuerzo comunitario. Se ha hecho posible gracias a numerosos colaboradores que han asumido varios roles,  como profesores, desarrolladores, diseñadores y ayudantes de muchos tipos. Muchas gracias a todos.

auth.canSaveProgress: Ahora puedes guardar tu progresión en la Academia de Bitcoin

errors.usernameRegex: El nombre de usuario solo puede contener letras, dígitos, _, y -
errors.usernameTooShort: El nombre de usuario debe tener al menos 5 caracteres

auth.lnurlAuthDescription: ¡Escanea este código QR con tu billetera Lightning para iniciar sesión!
auth.noAccountNeeded: ¡No hay necesidad de una cuenta para empezar a aprender en The Sovereign University!

bet.contribute: Este kit de herramientas está abierto a la contribución. Utiliza Figma, así que cualquiera puede añadir, modificar y traducir. Para colaborar, agregar una categoría o discutir, no dude en unirse a nuestro discord.

educationalContent.description: Este contenido está destinado a estar listo para ser utilizado para eventos educativos y su uso.
educationalContent.title: Contenido educativo

bet.pageDescription: The Sovereign University apoya a educadores de bitcoin y comunidades locales de todo el mundo, para ayudar a difundir la adopción de bitcoin. Hacia ese objetivo, recopilamos y hacemos accesible una gran base de datos, de ambos contenidos educativos (creado por nosotros como por otros), asi como de datos visuales.
bet.pageSubtitle: El BET - Un kit de herramientas de código abierto de Bitcoin para todos los proyectos educativos

visualContent.description: Este contenido es datos visuales sin formato, para ser usado para tus creaciones.
visualContent.title: Contenido visual

bookSummary.noSummary: Aún no se ha escrito ningún resumen. Si has leído el libro y quieres compartir un resumen, no dudes en escribir uno en GitHub. ¡Esto ayudaría mucho a la comunidad, mejoraría la universidad e incluso podrías conseguir algunos sats por él!
bookSummary.notice: este resumen está vinculado a github, para cualquier modificación o adición
bookSummary.title: El resumen del libro

book.pageSubtitle: Esta biblioteca es de código abierto y está abierta a la contribución. ¡Gracias por calificar y compartir!

builders.pageSubtitle: Este portal es de código abierto y está abierto a la contribución. ¡Gracias por calificar y compartir!

details.taughtBy: Este curso está siendo impartido por :

explorer.footerp1: En The Sovereign University, nuestros profesores tienen completa autonomía sobre su contenido y las herramientas que desean que explores, siempre y cuando sigan el código de ética. Son bitcoiners apasionados de diversos orígenes.
explorer.footerp2: Si deseas mejorar un curso o proporcionar el tuyo propio, puedes hacerlo de manera sencilla a través de GitHub. Para apoyar a un profesor, puedes calificar el curso, dar propina al profesor directamente o convertirte en miembro de la universidad para respaldar la plataforma.
explorer.pageDescription: Aquí podrás encontrar una gran cantidad de cursos relacionados con Bitcoin en su totalidad, con una amplia gama de temas. Este contenido educativo es orgánico, creciendo a medida que Bitcoin se desarrolla. Todo el contenido es gratuito, de código abierto y accesible para todos. El índice de cursos está organizado en círculos para adaptarse al camino de aprendizaje de cada persona.
explorer.pageSubtitle: Bienvenido a la puerta de la plataforma e-learning.
explorer.s2p1: If you've started exploring the Bitcoin rabbit hole, you must know that it's an endless journey with many paths. Here at the university, we understand this and have design our educational content to be non-linear, autonomous and as extensive as it can be.
explorer.s2p2: You will be able to pick your own path and go along it, gaining skills and knowledge as far as your motivation goes.
explorer.s2p3: All our courses are 100% free so nothing can stop you !
explorer.s2t1: Bitcoin education is a journey not a destination
explorer.s3t1: Build your own path down the rabbit hole

courses.freeBanner: All our courses are offered for free. the university is based upon membership through donation and sharing.

quizz.clickOnPie: Click on the pie chart, so check your mistakes, and see the explanations
quizz.resultItsOk: Don't give up, you'll do better next time !

unreleased.theoreticalLightning: Cours théorique avancé sur le Lightning Network

header.content1: The PlanB platform aims to provide the best tools and educational content around the world to help people regain their sovereignty.
header.content2: From individuals to communities, we are here to help you along your Bitcoin journey.

section1.allLevels: From beginner to advanced, learn Bitcoin in the academy
section1.content1: Bitcoin is not only a technology and a form of money but also a revolutionary way to approach life. To echo this, our courses span a wide range of fields, empowering each individual to excel in their areas of interest and further their understanding.
section1.content2: From your first Bitcoin course to a deep dive into the protocol's specifics, our courses will help you navigate the rabbit hole safely.
section1.content3: There's no reason to hesitate. Knowledge awaits you.

section2.content1: At PlanB, we believe Bitcoin is an international revolution that concerns everyone. To empower billions of people, we are designing this platform to be multilingual and accessible to all.
section2.content2: The platform currently supports 7 languages, and more are being added every month. To achieve this, we use a mix of AI and the passion of Bitcoiners around the world.
section2.content3: You too can start bootstrapping your own local network in your country!
section2.everythingTranslated: Everything is translated to local languages

section3.bitcoinFocusContent: We focus on the Bitcoin revolution as a whole, from its base layer to various peer-to-peer communications around it
section3.communityContent: We are first and foremost a community of enthusiasts helping each other on their Bitcoin journey
section3.content1: Además de los cursos, nuestra gran cantidad de tutoriales te ayudará a dominar diferentes tecnologías, como billeteras, soluciones para comerciantes, intercambios, nodos, minería y soluciones de privacidad... Y porque eso aún no es suficiente, una gran cantidad de recursos, como libros, podcasts o videos, están clasificados, ordenados y disponibles en la plataforma.
section3.content2: Nuestro objetivo es proporcionarte las herramientas para que tengas éxito.
section3.content3: La red PlanB es una iniciativa para apoyar la educación de Bitcoin en todo el mundo. Es el cruce de varias empresas apasionadas por Bitcoin centradas en la educación, el software de código abierto, las redes peer-to-peer y el sentido de comunidad. Juntos, han decidido construir la red PlanB y ofrecer al ecosistema de Bitcoin las herramientas adecuadas para crecer.
section3.helpingCommunities: Ayudar a las comunidades de Bitcoin a crecer es nuestra misión
section3.letsHelpYou: ¡Déjanos ayudarte a dominar la tecnología, leer y escuchar sobre Bitcoin!
section3.openSourceContent: Nuestro objetivo es promover el libre flujo del conocimiento y ayudar a construir más soluciones de código abierto
section3.privacyContent: Consideramos que la privacidad es uno de los derechos humanos más fundamentales y esencial para el progreso
section3.seeResourcesMobile: Echa un vistazo a todos nuestros recursos
section3.seeTutorialsMobile: Echa un vistazo a todos nuestros tutoriales

section4.content1: ¡La red PlanB se enorgullece de colaborar con numerosas empresas de Bitcoin en todo el mundo para proporcionar los mejores recursos educativos posibles!
section4.planB: La Red PlanB es 100% de código abierto gracias a nuestros generosos patrocinadores
section4.together: ¡Juntos vamos a mejorar la educación en Bitcoin!

nodeNetwork.answer1: A node is simply a Bitcoin community that wants to move to the next step and accelerate its own local Bitcoin adoption! There is no minimum size to start with.
nodeNetwork.answer2: At Plan B, we aim to improve the educational Bitcoin ecosystem by providing the right tools to build and educate on Bitcoin. By becoming a node, your community will get access to a large range of resources, services, special educational training and more. Make your community count as a reference in the Bitcoin world.
nodeNetwork.answer3: To be part of the network you must align on some core values. These are: be bitcoin only, value privacy and care for the open source work.
nodeNetwork.answer4: A Bitcoin node can be of any size. Based on some requirements, different names will be attributed. A node with an hackerspace, a gym, some office place will be considered a ”Citadel” while your first bitcoin home town office will be known as “nodes”.
nodeNetwork.answer5: We wish to offer a safe heaven for bitcoiners around the world. We belive that by helping local hubs grow, we will be able to create a network of citadels where bitcoiners will be welcome to work, create, share and discuss safely.
nodeNetwork.description1: All around the world, Bitcoiners are coming together in communities.
nodeNetwork.description3: Educational centers, <0>hackerspaces</0>, and Bitcoin office spaces are on the rise.
nodeNetwork.description5: The dedication of the Bitcoin community to collaborate, support one another, and offer essential tools for their local counterparts is essential to thrive in the modern landscape.
nodeNetwork.description6: At PlanB, we recognize the challenges ahead for these communities builders. To support their efforts, we've introduced solutions to simplify their development process.
nodeNetwork.descriptionTitle: Every country needs a Plan B!
nodeNetwork.join1: By joining our network, we'll guide you in transitioning from a simple Bitcoin meetup to a fully secured Bitcoin citadel!
nodeNetwork.join6: You are not alone in trying to change the world. Let's pool our resources to succeed.
nodeNetwork.letsBuild: Let's build Bitcoin Citadel around the world
nodeNetwork.network1: They are already part of the Network!
nodeNetwork.pageSubtitle: Our strength is our community. let's gather into a global bitcoin network.
nodeNetwork.partnerBTCMap: Proud partner with BTC Map to integrate more than 250 communities into the map in 2023

resources.filterBarLabel: Find the perfect resources for your needs:
resources.headerText: Welcome into the infinit rabbit hole of Bitcoin ! In this section we will offer you in depth tutoriel on most bitcoin project out there. This pages in maintain by benevolel and passionate bitcoin who support thie open source project. If you fee we made a mistake please reach out. To see our financial attachement ot the project mention refer to our transparancie repport. Thanks for your trust in this university and enjoy the ride.
resources.pageDescription: Trying to understand Bitcoin is like exploring a maze that keeps growing. To aid you in your journey, we've curated an extensive collection of resources addressing a myriad of topics.
resources.pageSubtitle: Welcome into the infinite rabbit hole of Bitcoin!

details.checkAuthor: Check out the author's other contributions and support his work.
details.madeBy: This tutorial has been made by

centralized.description: Centralized exchanges are usually regulated entities that act as intermediaries between the banking system and the bitcoin ecosystem. They allow you to buy and sell large amounts of bitcoin and withdraw it to your wallet or bank account. They usually require KYC, and therefore monitor your activity, reporting it to financial surveillance institutions to respect local laws.

exchange.description: Exchanges are one of the entry and exit doors between your traditional currency (euro, dollars) and the bitcoin world. Exchanges can be regulated and KYC (Know Your Customer) compliant, or peer-to-peer and anonymous. Each exchange will offer different features, fee structures, liquidity, and customer support. Each bitcoiner will use a different one based on their needs and convictions.

peer-to-peer.description: Peer-to-peer exchanges are marketplaces where individuals exchange bitcoin for other currencies between themselves. These exchanges could be regulated or not and usually don't ask for much information (if any) about you. They simply facilitate the relationship between users. Their fees could be higher than traditional exchanges and their liquidity a bit lower. It is the preferred option for bitcoiners trying to avoid KYC.

exchange.shortDescription: Bitcoin buying-selling solutions, KYC and non-KYC
exchange.title: Exchange

explorer.description: All these tutorials have been written by passionate and dedicated bitcoiners, who wish to spread bitcoin education throughout the world. Don't forget to like, review, and tip them sats!

tutorials.headerText: Welcome into the infinit rabbit hole of Bitcoin ! In this section we will offer you in depth tutoriel on most bitcoin project out there. This pages in maintain by benevolel and passionate bitcoin who support thie open source project. If you fee we made a mistake please reach out. To see our financial attachement ot the project mention refer to our transparency report. Thanks for your trust in this university and enjoy the ride.

merchant.description: Ever wonder how to easily accept bitcoin for a business? Explore our various solutions to become an expert and easily set up a merchant solution for the shops around you. The Point of Sale solution varies based on the merchant's needs (physical or online), their volume, and the complexity of their operations. A generally good proxy is to simply start with a basic LN wallet, move to an easy, efficient solution (such as mobile PoS), and finally explore BTC Pay Server for advanced, complex, professional solutions.
merchant.shortDescription: Solutions for businesses to accept Bitcoin
merchant.title: Merchant

mining.description: The mining industry is a complex topic full of rabbit holes within. Here, we will try to accompany you on your journey by using hardware and software. From modifying an S9 into a home heater to trying to win the lottery with a nerd miner.
mining.title: Mining

bitcoin.description: A Bitcoin Core node is the ground zero of your Bitcoin sovereignty stack. It allows you to run the Bitcoin software and be part of the network. You will validate blocks and transactions, decide which rules you want to apply within the network, and stop using intermediaries to propagate your transactions. There are many ways to run a Bitcoin node, some more user-friendly than others.

node.description: Nodes are like your personal servers. In Bitcoin, it's the software that allows you to run the network, collect transactions, verify the rules, and be truly sovereign. Within our ecosystem, there exist various nodes, from Bitcoin Core, to Lightning implementations, RGB, or other more advanced privacy solutions.

lightning-network.description: A Lightning node allows you to take part in the Bitcoin layer 2 protocol called Lightning. You will be able to open channels, manage their liquidity, participate in the graph, and become non-custodial regarding your Lightning wallet.
lightning-network.name: Lightning Network

rgb.description: RGB is a scalable & confidential smart contracts system for Bitcoin & lightning network. It is a programmability layer for Bitcoin, with concepts of private & mutual ownership, abstraction and separation of concerns and represent "post-blockchain".

node.shortDescription: Solutions to operate a bitcoin node and join the network
node.title: Node

tutorials.pageDescription: Bitcoin is a wide industry, that becomes wider and wider everyday. To help you explore it, we’ve gathered a large number of tutorials that describe various solutions.
tutorials.pageSubtitle: Welcome into the infinite rabbit hole of Bitcoin!

bitcoin.description: Bitcoin is not private by default, it is intentionally designed to be pseudonymous, and every transaction is public and stored forever. In order to regain some confidentiality, we must use best user practices and specific tools integrated into our software. From avoiding address reuse to CoinJoin, through mixing your coins and connecting to your own node, we will help you on your journey towards privacy.

privacy.description: Privacy is a fundamental right. While we aspire to a world where privacy is the default, it is not the reality we live in. We will try to explain to you the best practices, assist you with tutorials, and set you on a more sovereign path regarding your data.

general.description: In the era of mass surveillance, regaining a certain level of privacy in your everyday life is essential. Given that each user will have a certain degree of paranoia and technological knowledge, it is perfectly normal to use certain tools and adapt them to your needs. Here, we will explore different protection solutions such as VPNs, Tor, Tails OS, PGP, encrypted messages, and much more.

privacy.shortDescription: Tools for backup and maintaining privacy
privacy.title: Privacy

wallet.description: A Bitcoin wallet is like your keychain. It allows you to spend and receive bitcoin. There are a lot of different types of wallets, all with different use cases, functions, costs, and user experiences. Each bitcoiner will use a different device based on their needs, level of exigence, and experience.

desktop.description: Desktop wallets are usually for more advanced users as they combine the use of hardware devices and the desktop wallet software. It's like having a new, more custom, and functionality-intensive interface for your hardware device to use. Such wallets offer multi-signature options, privacy features, inheritance integration mechanisms, and more.

hardware.description: Hardware wallets are usually used to store your long-term bitcoin savings. They are physical devices that aren't connected to the internet (often called "cold wallets") and are usually highly secure. Even though these devices are often open-source regarding their software, the hardware costs around 50 to 300 euros. Consider these devices like a bank account for larger amounts of savings that you would use once in a while.

mobile.description: Mobile wallets are usually used for daily spending. They integrate the Lightning Network for low-fee, instant transactions. They are usually connected to the internet (often called "hot wallets") and are therefore less secure than hardware wallets. They should be used only to store small amounts of bitcoin, consider them as your everyday wallet in your pocket.

wallet.shortDescription: Security solutions and usage of your bitcoins
wallet.title: Wallet

underConstruction.p1: A rabbit has tumbled down a hole. Because of this unexpected adventure, this page is under a bit of construction at the moment. We apologize for any inconvenience. Our team is in full gear to complete this page. If you're interested in lending a hand, please don't hesitate to check out our
